Question 78) In order to replace polyethylene bags, some supermarkets have used a new type of ecological plastic, which has in their composition corn starch and a thermoplastic polymeric resin, obtained from a petrochemical source.
In these plastics, the fragmentation of polymeric resin is facilitated because the carbohydrates present
A) Dissolve in the water.
B) absorb water easily.
C) caramelize for heating and break.
D) are digested by decomposing organisms.
E) decomposes spontaneously in contact with water and carbon dioxide.
